name: Collaborative Art: Making a Visual Poll with Our Bodies
description:
We'll create an arrow of life on the pier with numbers from 65 to 120 to 1000 to ‚ôæÔ∏è and ask you to stand next to your answer to a simple yet complicated question HOW LONG DO YOU WANT TO LIVE? 

We'd also like you to mark your relation to the longevity field: 

‚úñÔ∏ècross your hands on top of your head if you're "not a longevity person"

üîòdo nothing with your hands if you are a "longevity person" (work or volunteer in the field).


We'll take a picture from above (luckily we have camera people with a drone at Zuzalu!!) and create this visual poll! 


Hopefully we'll be able to do it not once but several times, at least one more time at the end of the Longevity week too!
